>
[Ode to Ouroboros](/Feats.aspx?ID=1650) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You learn the [_ode to ouroboros_](/Spells.aspx?ID=729) composition spell, which enables you to temporarily spare your allies from death.
name: Ode to Ouroboros
